alert.note: Alert for Cullman (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 3:19PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cullman County through 345 PM CDT... At 319 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Arkadelphia, or 9 miles northeast of Sumiton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dodge City, Colony, Bremen, Arkadelphia, Black Bottom and Smith Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
